modName: Xaphan by KillingSilence - Standalone Follower - DELETED - DELETED
summary:
A Request from KillingSilence to turn his Character into two standalone Follower Versions (Zyrion & Xaphan).
This is the Milkdrinker and NonVampire Version Xaphan. The Original and Vampire Version Zyrion is another separate Mod (see description for download link).
descriptionHtml:
This was a request from KillingSilence to turn his character into two standalone followers:

- Vampire Zyrion, kept his original appearance by KillingSilence, can be downloaded here:

- NonVampire Xaphan, altered appearance by me. 


[b]Location:[/b]

Found in the very first room of Bleak Falls Barrow, to the left (console command "coc bleakfallsbarrow01" to teleport to the place)


[b]Combat:
[/b]
- loves two handed weapons, can sneak a bit
- won't use magic, shouts and staves
- comes with no armor, but a draugr greatsword (wearing some shitty clothes, so he isn't naked)
- Lightfoot perk, some more basic perks...
- levels with you
- essential, unique


[b]Misc.:[/b]

- can be married
- voice is MaleEvenTonedAccented


[b]Armors and Accessories I used for the screenshots: [/b](pics from left to right)

BDO Red Oni Armor by Team Tal
Light Daedric Armor (RefurbMadness)
DE Geralt Towel from Apachii Divine Elegance Store (apachii & urshi)
Kynreeve Armor (Elleh)
Dragon Wing Rings (Skyrimfan5)
Astaroth Horns Redone (Th3Mut4nt)


I wish you good hunting with him!




[b]Credits
